name: Philosophical Simulation
description:
What do your philosophical views result in in this world created by someone else?

(Play in Windowed)

You wake up being tested in a simulation where you are asked questions in two worlds, the reality and dream world.  You're movement is bound to both players.

Inspired by the Matrix.

Theme Relevance: There are 2 worlds in which there are 2 questions, with 2 doors to choose from.

I am a beginner and I used the Unity engine.

Used this asset pack only for tiles in 'bottom world' : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/sunny-land-103349
